header.title: Frequently Asked Questions
header.subtitle: Have a question? We're here to help.

contactSection.title: Still have a question?
contactSection.subtitle: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Please chat to our friendly team.

q1.question: What are your company's official licenses and registration numbers?
q1.answer: Our company is fully licensed and compliant. Here are our official credentials: Business License #: 60857, Business Registration #: 135358, Brand Registration #: 23621, U.S. FDA Registration #: 13286924580, EU REX #: AFREXEXPD123456873KBL

q2.question: How can I get pricing for your saffron products?
q2.answer: Please visit our Store Page for current FOB prices. For shipping costs, check our Export Page. For direct pricing inquiries, contact our Sales Department at +93784061919.

q3.question: How do I request a proforma invoice?
q3.answer: Select your desired products with specifications and send details via email or WhatsApp. Our team responds within 24 hours. Phone support is available from 9 AM to 9 PM.

q4.question: What is the shelf life of your saffron?
q4.answer: Our saffron has a 3-year validity period from the production date.

q5.question: How should I store saffron?
q5.answer: Store in a cool, dry place away from direct light at temperatures around 30°C (86°F).

q6.question: How long are your prices valid?
q6.answer: Due to market fluctuations, all price lists and pre-invoices are valid for one day. For large orders, we can extend price validity to three days.

q7.question: What are your bulk packaging options?
q7.answer: For bulk orders: 500g vacuum-sealed packs in paper boxes, with 20 boxes per standard five-layer carton.

q8.question: What are your minimum and maximum order quantities?
q8.answer: Retail: Minimum 250g in metallic cans, shipped to your address. Wholesale: Minimum 10kg, maximum 500kg per order, shipped to your country's airport.

q9.question: Do you provide saffron quality analysis?
q9.answer: Yes. Our advanced laboratory is certified by Afghanistan's National Standard Organization. All products are tested, and analysis certificates are provided upon request.

q10.question: Do you offer private labeling?
q10.answer: Yes. We provide custom packaging and private labeling for orders over 10kg of saffron.

q11.question: What export documents do you provide?
q11.answer: We provide all required Afghanistan export documents: Packing List, Lab Analysis Report, Phytosanitary Certificate, Origin Form A (Safta) Certificate, Commercial Invoice, Customs Declaration, and Air Waybill or Transport Bill.

q12.question: What are your payment terms?
q12.answer: 50% advance payment, 50% balance after receiving all original export documents. Airway bill is sent after final payment. Payments are processed through our partner company in Dubai, UAE due to banking limitations in Afghanistan.

q13.question: What is your delivery time?
q13.answer: Goods are shipped within 10-15 days after the initial deposit, delivered CFR/C&F to the approved destination port. Note: Import duties are not included.

q14.question: How do you ship products?
q14.answer: We ship via express post, air freight, sea freight, or truck transport depending on destination and order size.

q15.question: How can I become an exclusive agent?
q15.answer: Contact us via email at info@rayansaffron.af or phone at +93784061919 with your request. We welcome exclusive partnership opportunities.
